com.thindeck.api

Interface Repos


  • @Immutable
public interface Repos
    Repositories of a User.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Repo add(String name)
      Add a new repository.
      Repo get(String name)
      Get it by name.
      Iterable<Repo> iterate()
      Iterate them all.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        @NotNull(message="repo can\'t be null")
Repo get(String name)
        Get it by name.

        The method should throw a runtime exception if a repo with this name doesn't exist. You should call add(String) to create a repo first.

        Parameters:
        name - The name
        Returns:
        Repo

      • add

        @NotNull(message="repo can\'t be null")
Repo add(String name)
        Add a new repository.

        The method should throw a runtime exception if a repository with this name already exists.

        Parameters:
        name - Unique name
        Returns:
        Repo

      • iterate

        @NotNull(message="iterable of repos can\'t be null")
Iterable<Repo> iterate()
        Iterate them all.
        Returns:
        All repositories of the user
